displayProperties.tip:
Duration refreshes on grenade kills and lasts 10 seconds:
•  1x: +10% damage, +10 Handling
•  2x: +21% damage, +20 Handling
•  3x: +33% damage, +30 Handling

Applies to the first shot only after 3.1 seconds after not firing.
•  +20 Aim Assistance
•  +20 Range
•  +5% damage falloff distance (excludes Shotguns)
•  -10% accuracy cone growth
Minor enemies spawn a medium-sized Stasis Crystal. Any enemy of rank greater than minor spawns a large-sized Crystal.
Decreases draw time to 440 ms for 3 seconds.
Once below ~150 HP, increased Reload Speed. Effect increases linearly as health decreases up to 100 Reload with 0.9x duration multiplier.

Stacks up to 5x and lasts for 2 seconds.
•  +5 Reload Speed, +5 Stability
•  +27 Reload Speed, 10 Stability
•  +32 Reload Speed, 15 Stability
•  +40 Reload Speed, +20 Stability
•  +54 Reload Speed, +23 Stability

When crouched, grants:
•  +30 Handling
•  +20 Stability
•  -40 Accuracy Cone Size
•  -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
•  -80 Recoil Yaw (Horizontal Recoil)
15% damage increase for 5 seconds.

displayProperties.description: Increases your Guardian's Infamy rank. Don't tell the Vanguard.

displayProperties.tip: Activates on weapon ready within 3 seconds of getting a kill with a different weapon. Grants +20% damage increase and +15 Handling for 7 seconds.
Headshots after hitting at least one bodyshot receive +8% increased precision damage. Fourth bullet in Aggressive Burst frames (Pulse Rifles) don't receive increased damage.
+3% movement speed and +10 Aim Assistance while ADS
Increases duration to 4.5 seconds.
Once below ~150 HP, handling and accuracy increases. Effect increases linearly as health decreases.
Grants +100 Ready/Stow Handling for 1 second, or until ADS.
67% damage increase.
Prevents ping on radar after shooting while crouched. Increases arrow hold time by +25%.
+13% Velocity, +10 Reload Speed with 0.8x multiplier.
+33% faster ADS than +100 Handling. Stacks with Targeting mods, Threat Detector, and Wraithmetal Mail.
Activates within ~15 meters of 3 enemies, lingers for ~4 seconds.
When active, adds +45 Handling and grants a +5% faster swap speed. Fully refreshes weapon when held or stowed.
7.8% damage increase to Major combatants. This includes Champions.

Has a duration of 5 seconds. Marksman's Dodge and Wraithmail Metal (Dragon's Shadow) can also trigger this perk.
•  Precision: +33% damage
•  Non-precision: +30% damage
+63 Reload Speed with a 0.9x multiplier for 6 seconds

displayProperties.description: Synthcord material which can be converted to Synthweave using the Loom.

displayProperties.tip: On precision kills, grants +10 Range per stack and maxes at 3 stacks. On non-precision kill, removes a stack and grants Accuracy Cone growth and +30 Stability. Lasts 7 seconds and is refreshed on kill.

Adds the following when Last Guardian Standing:
•  +100 Handling
•  +100 Reload
•  +100  Aim Assistance
•  Massively decreased flinch received
•  Increased accuracy
•  Stronger target highlighting through scope
•  Enables radar while aiming down sights
4 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds adds 2 shots to the magazine.

Greatly increases Accuracy after sustained fire for 0.6 seconds, almost negating the effects of bloom.
•  Adds 9 Stability over time.
In-air accuracy is still bad unless used with Icarus Grip.
+25% damage increase
Increases perk's damage bonus to 40%. Swords increase to 35%. Bonus lingers for 1.5 seconds after leaving Surrounded range.
10% damage increase to all Taken combatants, including Riven and Techeuns (Sedia, Kalli, & Shuro-Chi).
After not shooting for 4 seconds, reloads 10% of the magazine. Maximum of more than double magazine size.
+63 Reload Speed with a 0.9x multiplier for 6 seconds
15% damage increase.
Grants the equivalent of 1 Special Ammo pickup.

Lasts 5.5 seconds.
• 1x:  +15% Accuracy, +15 Stability, +~20 Recoil Direction
• 2x:  +30% Accuracy, +30 Stability, +~40 Recoil Direction

4 seconds after switching to Fusion Rifle:
•  Multiplies Charge Time by 0.8
•  +20% reduced damage
•  +100 Handling
Primary weapons get refilled (generates ammo from nothing). Special and Power weapons get refreshed (reloaded with no animation, does not trigger on reload perks).
Activates once the magazine falls below 50%. Grants +25%-50% increased accuracy and up to +20 Stability.
On Elemental/Barrier or Guardian shield break: Applies a debuff that grants 50% increased Kinetic damage for 5.5 seconds. Stacks with other debuffs due to being a weapon perk.
+30% damage increase for 1.5 seconds.
+20% more damage and 100 ms faster Charge Time during a slide after sprinting for 1.5 seconds. Buff can expire mid-burst if you don't immediately start charging.

Activates when near friendly Guardians and AI allies. Bugged as of Sept. 5, 2021. Should be 20% across all weapons, but is the following:
•  Snipers: ~12/14%
•  MGs: ~6%
•  Linear Fusions: ~14%
Does not work with the Exotic trait on the Warlock helmet, Verity's Brow.
Activates within ~15m of 3 enemies. Grants 100 ms faster Charge Time/Draw Time. Lingers for 1.5 seconds.

displayProperties.description: Increases your Guardian's Valor rank. Also, it may cause Lord Shaxx to become excited.

displayProperties.tip: Reloads 10-17% of the magazine per kill.
Explosion radius increased by 50%. Increases damage up to 50% from the epicentre of the explosion.

When hipfiring:
•  +1.2x Aim Assistance falloff
•  +15 Aim Assistance
•  +2.7 degree precision angle threshold (except for Sniper Rifles)
•  +~30 more accuracy
•  +~30 Stability
Grants +25 Stability and +10% increased accuracy for 0.6 seconds. Refreshes immediately after not firing. For controller, the weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.

Splits 55% of damage into explosive damage with +30% damage and no fall off. Detonates after 0.6 seconds.
•  PvE: +12% increase to precision damage and +16% to non-precision damage.
•  PvP: total damage remains almost the same.
5% damage increase against Combatant Shields. Bullets are able to penetrate up to 1 enemy.
Increase magazine capacity by 10% per kill up to a maximum of 50%.
Lasts 3 seconds. Refreshes 15% of the magazine and grants +~20 Stability & +~25 Handling.

Gradual damage increase when magazine is at or less than 50% full.
•  PvE: +12.1%-25.6% damage.
•  PvP: +3%-6% damage.
Randomly increases magazine between +10% and +50% on reload. Always rounds magazine up.
Removes reticle bounce and weapon shake on repeated hits. No boost to Stability. Noticeable mostly on controllers, as their reticle bounces on fire, akin to Machine Guns on mice.
Kills create an elemental explosion. Not affected by Dragonfly Spec.

Lasts for 6 seconds, additional kills add 6 seconds, caps at 8 seconds.
•  +20 Range
•  +50 Mobility
•  +~40 Handling
•  +30% ADS movement speed
•  1.05x Damage Falloff Distance Multiplier

Killing and reloading will interrupt and reset current buff timer. Stacks are always reset upon reload. Has a duration of 5 seconds.
•  1x: +17% damage
•  2x: +33% damage
•  3x: +50% damage

Activates 1.5 seconds after aiming down sights and not firing. 
•  Scout Rifle: +66% damage
•  Linear Fusion: +33% damage
•  Sniper (Aggressive): +37% damage
•  Sniper (Adaptive & Rapid-Fire): +31% damage
Within 15 metres of an ally, gain +30 Handling and a reload speed bonus. Lingers for 1.5 seconds.

200% melee damage increase on most combatants.
•  Minors: 200%
•  Majors: 200%
•  Ultras: 350%
•  Liar's Handshake: 80% (reduced)
Primary weapon kills and Heavy weapon kills grant +1% Super energy. Special weapon kills grant +1.5% (+1% in PvP) Super energy.

Last 3.5 seconds. Grants a flat Reload Speed bonus and a multiplier per stack:
•  1x: +10 Reload Speed/0x
•  2x: +45 Reload Speed/0.9x
•  3x: +55 Reload Speed/0.88x
•  4x: +75 Reload Speed/0.85x
•  5x: +100 Reload Speed/0.8x
7.8% damage increase to Boss/Ultra combatants.

•  +10% Zoom when ADS
•  +5% Velocity when ADS
Creates an elemental explosion based on the weapon's element damage type, has a 3 metre radius, and is not affected by weapon perks.
After ADS for 1 second without firing, flinch is reduced by 35%. Stacks multiplicatively with unflinching mods.

•  +45 Reload Speed with 0.8x multiplier and 0.8x ready/stow animation duration.
•  The Inventory Size increase is the reserves boost.
Increases Explosive Damage by 0.63% for every metre past 10 metres, up to 25% at 50 metres.

Activates after reloading 6 seconds after a kill.
•  +20 Aim Assistance
•  +20% accuracy
Attack must be guarded within ~0.5 seconds of starting Block. 50% damage increase for 2 seconds.

Splits 50% of damage into explosive damage with 30% more damage and no fall off.
•  In PvE, 11% increase to precision damage and 15% to non-precision damage.
•  In PvP, total damage remains almost the same.
Reloading within 6 seconds of a precision kill increases your Rate of Fire to 600 Rounds Per Minute for 7 seconds. Reduces damage by 20% against combatants. Can be refreshed.
Refreshes magazine on elemental or Barrier Champion shield break. Energy weapons generate 1 ammo per hit against matching elemental shields.
Starts health regen and grants ~80 HP after obtaining 3 points. Rank-And-File grant 1 point, Guardians grant 2, Elites/Mini-Bosses/Bosses grant 3. Kills must be within ~8s of eachother.
Lasts ~3 seconds with a 0.3 second cooldown. Refreshes 15% of the magazine and grants +20 Range and +~50 Stability.
+15% damage increase to Rocket Launchers.
On low-tier Minor hit, grants one stack.

One of five artifacts required for Worldline Zero's catalyst.

displayProperties.tip: Explosion disorients enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
Reloads stowed weapons from reserves after 3 seconds.
50% damage increase to impact damage. If you get this perk, aim for low Blast Radius and high Velocity.
Refreshes stowed weapons after reloading up to 6 seconds after a kill.

Splits 55% of damage into explosive damage with +30% damage and no fall off. Detonates after 0.6 seconds.
•  PvE: +12% increase to precision damage and +16% to non-precision damage.
•  PvP: total damage remains almost the same.
Activation window is 2.5 seconds.
Refils magazine by 50-60% for Primary weapons or 30-40% for Special weapons

Lasts 3.5 seconds.
•  1x: +10% damage
•  2x: +21% damage
•  3x: +33% damage

Multi-charge abilities contribute to the requirements (ex. 2 grenades and a melee will count as max benefit Surplus).
•  1x: +5 Reload Speed, +10 Handling, +5 Stability
•  2x: +22 Reload Speed, +25 Handling, +15 Stability
•  3x: +50 Reload Speed, +50 Handling, +25 Stability
[Stasis] increases ADS movement speed by +5%.
20% chance on miss to return 1 shot to the magazine.
Primary and Power weapon kills grant 10% grenade energy and Special weapon kills grant 20% grenade energy. 3 second cooldown on the grenade-usage-reload effect.

Lasts 3.5 seconds.
•  1x: +10% damage
•  2x: +21% damage
•  3x: +33% damage
Grants +7.5% ability energy split equally across all uncharged abilities.
Refills magazine to 2x capacity.
Lasts 6 seconds. Generally grants a +25% damage (+20% for shotguns and bows) and -20% slower rate of fire or charge time. Varies per archetype.
Triggers ammo-pickup perks.

Activates within 8m of 3 enemies. Swords have a reduced bonus compared to other weapons.
•  Normal: 30%
•  Swords: 25%
Increases handling by ~20.
10% increase to impact damage.
Precision kills grant +45 Reload Speed for 6 seconds. Same radius as Dragonfly Spec, but deals +25% more damage. Does not work with Dragonfly Spec.
50% damage increase to Kinetic weapons.

Has a duration of 3 seconds.
•  1x: 6%
•  2x: 12%
•  3x: 18%
•  4x: 24%
•  5x: 30%

Rockets detonate 3 seconds after impact and deal +20% more blast damage.
•  +25 Blast Radius
+35% damage after hitting three separate targets within 3 seconds of one another.

•  Within 15 metres of 1 enemy: +~15 Stability, +15 Reload Speed, +25% faster Handling animation speed.
•  Within 15m of 2+ enemies: +~40 Stability, +55 Reload Speed, and +43% faster Handling animation speed.

Lasts 4.5 seconds.
•  1x: +6.6% damage
•  2x: +13.2% damage
•  3x: +20% damage
•  4x: +26.6% damage
•  5x: +33.3% damage
7.8% damage increase to Minor combatants.
Being in combat for 12 seconds grants +15% increased damage, +~50 Handling, and +50 Reload Speed. Lasts until out of combat. Being in Combat is having dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.

While last Guardian standing, kills fully refresh the magazine.
•  +30 Magazine
Increases fire rate by +10% on shotguns only.
